description: man looking down right with rod in left hand; banner(?) attached to rod and ends to left of right arm; partial coat of arms above head; church behind and below figure; three coats of arms in left margin; on verso another image with title "Giramburg" and three crows on banner
inscription:
Inscription

in plate at top in black: [Lintpurg]; in plate lower right in black: [ IK]; in left margin three coats of arms; in red in left margin: [Sie vier/ Pauren,/ Edin/(coat of arms)/ Regenspurg/ (coat of arms)/ Eosteng/ (coat of arms)]; on verso image: [Gramburg/ Diij]]
title: Lintpurg
